channel.title: Changing stats on a weapon or item
channel.description:
well i got 2 things on my server the bandos war spear which has 0 str bonus and a ring of stone that has 35 and i wanna reduce that
where would i go and how would i change it step by step
ive been coding 525s+ for so long that i dont even remember 317s coz when i started coding servers i went straight to 508

item.title: Changing stats on a weapon or item
item.dc:creator: @darken4400 darken4400
item.description:
@darken4400 wrote:

this one is pretty standard , so go to a folder either data or config. there should be a item.cfg. open it with notepad, then look for your bandos warspear in that file do control+f its either bandos warspear or bandos_warspear either one.
the first 3 numbers are the price they might be pretty long so just ignore that. the 0â€™s and for the attack bonus, defense bonus, str bonus, and prayer bonus. count them down in order to find which one is for str bonus and thats about it i guess

Read full topic
item.source: Changing stats on a weapon or item
